item.title: CVE-2023-0835|2023-04-04T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- markdown-pdf
item.description: markdown-pdf version 11.0.0 allows an external attacker to remotely obtain arbitrary local files. This is possible because the application does not validate the Markdown content entered by the user.
